Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Here are some ways that you might think about or deal with taking care of diabetes. Select the answer that best describes you. There are no right or wrong answers.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Before I solve a diabetes problem I try to understand as much as I can about it.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 2. When I think a situation will get in the way of taking care of diabetes, I try to prevent that from happening.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 3. If I don't understand how to do something related to my diabetes, I try to get that information pretty quickly.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 4. I try to look at a diabetes problem in different ways before I take action.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 5. I try to predict what will happen if I choose a certain solution to a diabetes problem.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 6. Before I try a solution with my diabetes I try to figure out what could go wrong.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Before I try to solve a diabetes problem, I like to be clear on a plan.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 8. I don't let a diabetes problem go on too long before I take action.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 9. I follow through and put my diabetes solutions into action.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 10. If a solution to a diabetes problem doesn't work, I try to figure out why

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 11. After trying to solve a diabetes problem I notice if the situation is better.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 12. I learn something when a solution to a diabetes problem doesn't work.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 13. If my first solution doesn't work, I go back and try to solve the diabetes problem again.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Almost Never
 3, About Half the Time 
 4, Almost Always 
 5, Always
